spell.lulasmod.tooltip.treachery_judecca: Produces a blade from the side of the hand to cleave through your enemies.
spell.lulasmod.tooltip.malignity: Fires a fireball from the seal of the user to deal great damage.
spell.lulasmod.tooltip.purloining: Launches the user forward with incredible speed and negates all built up fall damage.
spell.lulasmod.tooltip.guile: Makes the user disappear in a big cloud of smoke.
spell.lulasmod.tooltip.emulations: Locks the target in place and throws projectiles at it.
spell.lulasmod.tooltip.wickedness: Teleports the user to their spawn point
spell.lulasmod.tooltip.heresies: Teleports either the player or any entity in proximity into a almost perfect clone of the overworld and back.
spell.lulasmod.tooltip.envy: Shoots out a quick amethyst dart.
death.attack.amethyst_shard: %1$s was shanked by an amethyst shard
